cause.description:
Help me raise money for a great organization such as the World Wildlife Fund. They do fantastic work around the world. Check out their site for more info.
www.wwf.org
Or
http://www.wwf.ca/index.cfm for WWF Canada
I know there are a million causes out there to support and we would like to do something for them all. In reality you probably can't do it all, but why not start trying right here?
1. Save the Animals - Conserve Species at Risk
2. Save the Planet - Protect Threatened Habitats
3. Save Us All!!!
cause.mission: Save our Planet...and everything on it!!!
cause.name: Help Mikey Save the World!!!
